example.text: If Sen. Tuberville is so concerned with military readiness, he should withdraw his hold on nominations and let our officers do their jobs — not defend white supremacists. [[url]]

I sent Governor Baker a letter asking to meet during his first 100 days in office so we can get started on key initiatives, like the WINS Act, my legislation to advance equity in the NCAA. I am grateful for Governor Baker’s willingness to work together to empower student athletes [[url]]

With the support of the [[user]], we’re broadening support for my bill, the Vet CENTERS for Mental Health Act, that expands access to mental healthcare for vets. Proud to be a part of this group of veterans committed to improving the quality of life for those who served [[url]]
If Sen. Tuberville is so concerned with military readiness, he should withdraw his hold on nominations and let our officers do their jobs — not defend white supremacists. [[url]]

I sent Governor Baker a letter asking to meet during his first 100 days in office so we can get started on key initiatives, like the WINS Act, my legislation to advance equity in the NCAA. I am grateful for Governor Baker’s willingness to work together to empower student athletes [[url]]

Keep reading to learn more. Take care, Mikie Sherrill The 2023 National Defense Authorization Act I joined my colleagues from both sides of the aisle to pass the NDAA, a bill that will deliver a stronger national defense and support our men and women in uniform.

I sent Governor Baker a letter asking to meet during his first 100 days in office so we can get started on key initiatives, like the WINS Act, my legislation to advance equity in the NCAA. I am grateful for Governor Baker’s willingness to work together to empower student athletes [[url]]
